targets.description: Array of (User, Access Control Group) ids this set targets

enabled.description: Whether this set of permissions is enabled

blockAccess.description: Short circuit for whether the targets should have access to the assessment

listBeforeRelease.description: Whether students can see the title and click into the assessment before release

enabled.description: Whether dateControl is enabled or not

earlyDeadlines.description: Array of early deadlines with credit as percentages

lateDeadlines.description: Array of late deadlines with credit as percentages

afterLastDeadline.description: Controls for assessment behaviour after last deadline

enabled.description: Whether praireTestControl is enabled or not

exams.description: Array of associated PrairieTest exam configs

readOnly.description: Whether the exam is read-only for students

hideQuestions.description: Whether to enable settings controlling question visibility after assessment completion

showQuestionsAgainDate.description: Date as ISO String for when to unhide questions to students after assessment completion

hideQuestionsAgainDate.description: Date as ISO String for when to rehide questions to students after unhiding questions after assessment completion

hideScore.description: Whether to enable settings controlling score visibility after assessment completion

showScoreAgainDate.description: Date as ISO String for when to reveal hidden scores after assessment completion

date.description: Date as ISO String for additional deadline

credit.description: Amount of credit as a percent to allow
